title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Online Project-Based Professional Development for Career Counselors

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational career counseling theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Career counselors can develop three strategies to apply core concepts of CCT (Career Construction Theory) in practice
Learners can revise and improve their professional development plans based on peer feedback through online discussions
Participants can incorporate two or more practical solutions into PBL projects based on understanding of the evolving professional world
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
